h2_title: Hundred-Eyed Daoist Master Boss Fight and Guide
content: Speaking of deflecting, it you favor the Rock Solid spell, do be warned that the Hundred-Eyed Daoist has a particular distaste for the skill. After you successfully use it to deflect his attacks, there's a good chance that he'll notice the move and say he "forbids" as he burrows into the ground.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Hundred-Eyed_Daoist_Master.md', within the main section titled 'Hundred-Eyed Daoist Master', specifically from the subsection 'Hundred-Eyed Daoist Master Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
Speaking of deflecting, it you favor the Rock Solid spell, do be warned that the Hundred-Eyed Daoist has a particular distaste for the skill. After you successfully use it to deflect his attacks, there's a good chance that he'll notice the move and say he "forbids" as he burrows into the ground.
